#Text= Korra says : " Tenzin 's brother ?

column1: #Text=" Iroh says : " Yes , bit of a wild man , but the bravest commander you 'll ever meet .
#Text=" Gommu says : " Ready , sir .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Fleet ambushed and destroyed by Equalist aircraft .
#Text=Retreat to Red Sand Island until my signal .
#Text=Do not approach city until you receive the all clear .
#Text=Now comes the hard part .
#Text=We need to ground those aircrafts .
#Text=Otherwise , Bumi 's fleet would never be able to retake the city .
#Text=" Mako says : " They flew in from this direction .
#Text=The airfield must be somewhere over this mountain range .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Everyone get ready , we leave at dawn .
#Text=" Asami says : " It 's time to take down my father .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait , I 'm sorry , but I 'm not going with you tomorrow .
#Text=" Mako says : " What ?
#Text=" Asami says : " Why not ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sick and tired of hiding from Amon .
#Text=It 's time I face him .
#Text=" Iroh says : " That 's not a good plan .
#Text=We need to stick together .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm not waiting for him to hunt me down .
#Text=My guts tell me it 's time to end this , on my terms .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Korra , this is not a mission you should be handling alone .
#Text=" Mako says : " She wo n't be .
#Text=I 'm going with you .
#Text=" Korra says : " You do n't have to do that .
#Text=" Mako says : " Yes , I do .
#Text="
